Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO TRANSPORTATION

Title: Relates to the registration of autocycles
Summary: Requires the registration of autocycles, which are three-wheeled motor vehicles that have a steering wheel and seating which does not require the operator to sit with a leg on either side of the seat; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the registration and operation of autocycles; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
